text: Ezɨ Atrivim Devit, Israelian Jordanɨn Fanemɨn aruem anadi naghɨn itir danganir kabagh ativagh dar ganasa Jeria, ko an adarazi amɨsefe, men dɨbobonim 2,700ɨn tu. Nguazir kaba, Rubenɨn anabam ko Gatɨn anabam ko Manasen anabar me tuirazimningɨn faragha zuimɨn adarazir nguaziba. Ezɨ 2,700plan gumazir kaba me gumazir bar aghuiba, egha uan ikɨzibar gumazir dapaniba. Egha gumazamiziba God bagha amir ingangariba ko atrivimɨn ingangariba bar dagh ativagha dar gari.
